name: Emoji Quiz Adventure
description:
This is Quiz to train your brain in all kind of different styles.
you want to match emoji to find a word?
Improve your English Dictionary?
Compete with others over the Internet?
Or playing offline all the day?
this game covers everything!

Perfect game for family, friends or solo players.

Offline Game
Have to travel and want to play a game on the go? No problem! Our Emoji Quiz game doesn't download any unnecessary data in order for you to play the game offline!

Support
Have any questions or concerns about the game? Email me personally
gogetax2@gmail.com


New levels and game modes coming soon, check the updates!
